---
title: "Overview"
---

## High-level description
The `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE` directory houses templates and configuration for GitHub issues in the React Email project. It aims to standardize bug reports and guide users to appropriate communication channels for questions and feature requests.

## What does it do?
This directory helps streamline the process of reporting issues and requesting features for the React Email project. 

- It provides a structured template for bug reports, ensuring users include essential information like reproduction steps and expected behavior. 
- It disables the creation of blank issues, guiding users to use predefined templates or contact links.
- It offers clear links for asking questions and making feature requests, directing users to the appropriate channels.

## Key Files
- **`1.bug_report.yml`**: Defines a template for reporting bugs, with fields for describing the issue, affected packages, reproduction steps, expected behavior, and system information.
- **`config.yml`**: Configures issue templates for the repository, disabling blank issues and providing contact links for questions and feature requests.
